name: mca-starter-kit
description: Mobile Chrome Apps Starter Kit is Yet Another Opinionated Boilerplate for Chrome Apps development
author: Jimmy Moon

scripts.postinstall: cd src; npm install && npm install --save-dev cca-delegate gulp-util && bower install; gf-import ./bower_components/font-roboto/roboto.html --html=./bower_components/font-roboto/; cd ./platform; cca prepare
scripts.config: cd platform; cordova-config set name "$NAME"; cordova-config set id $ID
